Question: This person's Breaking Home Ties sold for $15.4 million at a 2006 Sotheby's auction.
Hints: This person married his third wife, retired Milton Academy English teacher Mary Leete "Molly" Punderson, on October 25, 1961.
This person's work was dismissed by serious art critics in his lifetime.
During the late 1940s, this person spent the winter months as artist-in-residence at Otis College of Art and Design.
